title: Bed Set, 18th century
medium:
Medium: cotton, silk
Technique: chain stitch embroidery on twill ground
description: Bed-set of yellow-green taffeta (now lined with canvas) decorated with applied bands and medallions of Indian embroidery in chain stitch on twill cotton. Component A is the bedcover of taffeta with borders and central medallion of embroidery applied. Component B is a long valance made of three pieces stitched together with bands of embroidery applied. Component C is a shorter valance and is the same as B. Components D and E are two narrow tie-backs, entirely embroidered. Components F and G are fragments of taffeta.

tombstone.epitaph:
Bed Set, 18th century. Medium: cotton, silk
Technique: chain stitch embroidery on twill ground. 1959-83-1-a/g.
